an3.77:1: Then the Venerable Ānanda approached the Blessed One … and said to him:
an3.77:2: (1) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the sensory realm, would sense-sphere existence be discerned?"
an3.77:3: (2) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the form realm, would form-sphere existence be discerned?"
an3.77:4: (3) "If, Ānanda, there were no kamma ripening in the formless realm, would formless-sphere existence be discerned?.
